purpleculture_pinyin:
chóu
chip (in gambling); token (for counting); ticket; to prepare; to plan; to raise (funds); resource; means
фишка (в азартных играх); жетон (для подсчета); проездной билет; подготовить; планировать; собрать (средства); ресурс; средства
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 筹)
Pictophonetic: 壽 indicates the sound; ⺮ (bamboo) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
籌備 [ chóu bèi ]: preparations; to get ready for sth
籌集 [ chóu jí ]: to collect money; to raise funds
籌資 [ chóu zī ]: to raise resources
籌措 [ chóu cuò ]: to raise (money)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • ⺮ [ zhú ] bamboo; flute
    • 壽 [ shòu ] old age, longevity; lifespan
heisig_chinese_memo: The long gray beard man likes to make arrangements and then carve out his plans in sheets of bamboo paper.
Ru_trainchinese: chóu: (сущ/глаг) фишка, бирка, стратегия, метод; планировать, подготавливать
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: It's easy to make arrangements if you take the long gray beard man to a bamboo restaurant.  It's his favorite.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " bamboo " and " shou ", the original meaning is the arrow used in ancient pot throwing. "Shu Wen": "The pot and the arrow are also from bamboo, the sound of longevity." "The Book of Rites-Toss the Pot": "Chou, five in the room, seven in the hall, and nine in the courtyard." Chen Xunji said: "Chou, ya and also."

" Chi " can mean calculation. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Deng Yu Biography": "Guangwu's red eyebrows must break Chang'an, and he wants to take a ride and pass the pass. However, Fang is in Shandong, unknown to send, and Yu Shen is generous, so he is given a strategy of discussing in the west."

" Chi " can also mean planning. "Historical Records: The Family of Liuhou": "The minister, please use Qianqi to raise it for the king."

" Chip " also means a tool for counting. "Northern History·Wang Yong Biography": "There are many advantages and disadvantages in the state, which is collected by Wen Ling."

" Chi " is also used as a quantifier to indicate one. "Water Margin" Chapter 15: "Six-chip heroes were taking a blessing and drinking in the back hall, only to see a Zhuangke newspaper saying: "There is a gentleman in front of the door who wants to see."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " bamboo " and " shou ", the original meaning is the arrow used in ancient pots.
humanum_full_description:
從「竹」，「壽」聲，本義為古代投壺所用的矢。《說文》：「壺矢也。从竹，壽聲。」 《禮記‧投壺》：「籌，室中五扶，堂上七扶，庭中九扶。」陳澔集說：「籌，矢也。」

　　「籌」可表示算計。《後漢書‧鄧禹傳》：「光武籌赤眉必破長安，欲乘舋并關中，而方自事山東，未知所寄，以禹沈深有大度，故授以西討之略。」

　　「籌」也可表示策劃。《史記‧留侯世家》：「臣請藉前箸為大王籌之。」

　　「籌」還表示記數的用具。《北史‧王勇傳》：「州頗有優劣，文令探籌取之。」

　　「籌」也作量詞，表示個。《水滸傳》第15回：「六籌好漢正在後堂散福飲酒，只見一個莊客報說：『門前有個先生要見。』」
humanum_short_description: 從「竹」，「壽」聲，本義為古代投壺所用的矢。

Chinese: The long gray beard man likes to make arrangements and then carve out his plans in sheets of bamboo paper.
Meaning: make arrangements
Hanzi: 筹
Story: It's easy to make arrangements if you take the long gray beard man to a bamboo restaurant. It's his favorite.
Kind: traditional

從「 竹 」，「 壽 」聲，本義為古代投壺所用的矢。《說文》：「壺矢也。从竹，壽聲。」 《禮記‧投壺》：「籌，室中五扶，堂上七扶，庭中九扶。」陳澔集說：「籌，矢也。」 「 籌 」可表示算計。《後漢書‧鄧禹傳》：「光武籌赤眉必破長安，欲乘舋并關中，而方自事山東，未知所寄，以禹沈深有大度，故授以西討之略。」 「 籌 」也可表示策劃。《史記‧留侯世家》：「臣請藉前箸為大王籌之。」 「 籌 」還表示記數的用具。《北史‧王勇傳》：「州頗有優劣，文令探籌取之。」 「 籌 」也作量詞，表示個。《水滸傳》第15回：「六籌好漢正在後堂散福飲酒，只見一個莊客報說：『門前有個先生要見。』」
From the sound of " bamboo" and " shou", the original meaning is the arrow used in ancient pot throwing. "Shu Wen": "The pot and the arrow are also from bamboo, the sound of longevity." "The Book of Rites-Toss the Pot": "Chou, five in the room, seven in the hall, and nine in the courtyard." Chen Xunji said: "Chou, ya and also." " Chi" can mean calculation. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Deng Yu Biography": "Guangwu's red eyebrows must break Chang'an, and he wants to take a ride and pass the pass. However, Fang is in Shandong, unknown to send, and Yu Shen is generous, so he is given a strategy of discussing in the west." " Chi" can also mean planning. "Historical Records: The Family of Liuhou": "The minister, please use Qianqi to raise it for the king." " Chip" also means a tool for counting. "Northern History·Wang Yong Biography": "There are many advantages and disadvantages in the state, which is collected by Wen Ling." " Chi" is also used as a quantifier to indicate one. "Water Margin" Chapter 15: "Six-chip heroes were taking a blessing and drinking in the back hall, only to see a Zhuangke newspaper saying: "There is a gentleman in front of the door who wants to see."
